https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hQGvyoipHKS9iPfr9XYQ7RU8z1Z.jpg This film highlights moments in the long and rich African American cinema history in relation to social and political events, and how it affected Black viewers of the time. A Century of Black Cinema
